author: rgrabowski
msg: Initial support for 'condenseSql' statement attribute to preserves whitespace of sql text. Setting can be applied at the statement level as well as by a global setting.

author: rgrabowski
msg: Added Sqlite test project along with public domain Sqlite ADO.Net 2.0 driver.
Updated providers.config Solution Item with SQLite3 provider info and removed old .NET 1.0 provider entries.

author: rgrabowski
msg: Removed empty skeleton test projects for MySql, Odbc, OleDb, OracleClient, OracleODP, and PostgreSQL.
